name: A Space Adventure
description:
A Space Adventure is a very simple text adventure game ,and also my first one, for the Game Off 2020 game jam participation.  I used Javascript to make the main logic of the program. For quick testing, these are the solutions in the correct order. Feel free to test it out.

Start , North , East , West , Read note , South , Ready , 3 , 6 , 141 , 14163.

This is my Github page and my personal portfolio. For soundtrack, I used one of my own tracks George Moratis - Out There .
